diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Poorly differentiated adenocarcinoma of the lung with an activating mutation in the EGFR gene
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was supported by findings of a pathologic compression fracture of T9, presence of a suprahilar mass with mediastinal invasion observed on imaging, and cytologic examination revealing nonâ€“small-cell lung cancer, indicating a neoplastic process. Immunohistochemical tests were positive for thyroid transcription factor 1 and cytokeratin CK7, supporting the diagnosis of adenocarcinoma of pulmonary origin.
